newsitem.title: UK: FTSE 100 up after FOMC meeting, awaits UK sales.
newsitem.headline: FTSE 100 up after FOMC meeting, awaits UK sales.

text.p: The FTSE 100 climbed further into record territory at the open as the market breathed a sigh of relief that U.S. monetary authorities refrained from raising U.S. interest rates.
At 0738 GMT, the index was up 9.2 points at 3,892.4. September futures were up 6.0 points, breaking the 3,900 level, at 3,902.
"The markets are quite happy the Fed didn't do anything," said one trader.
